short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The easiest way to shop fashion with your friends. Upgrade your shopping game

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Say goodbye to your endless screenshots, links, dozens of Wishlists, and all the impractical ways you used to shop together online ! 
 
This extension allows you to add items from any fashion shop, to the only fashion Wishlist you’ll ever need, while sharing them with your friends, effortlessly! 
 
Are you ready to upgrade your shopping game ? Download our app available on all stores to :
 
💞🛍 Shop fashion with your friends, live
Discover items, brands and shops together ! Whenever you add an item to your Wishlist, it is automatically shared with your friends live. 
 
🧥🤔 Get feedback through votes, battles and sharing fittings !
Not sure about an item? Take the best decision: create votes, battles, or share your fittings. Interact as you would on your shopping spree with your friends! 
 
💜👀 Keep an eye on all your favorite items and shops !
Keep all your fashion findings from all your favorite shops in one place.
 
👗👔 Get a shopping experience tailored to you
So over with endlessly scrolling to see an item you would like? Add your favorite shops to your profile, and go to Personalized research mode to only see Items that fit your style.
 
🕶🔝 Challenge your style
Want to change it up a little bit? Go on Discovery research mode and find new brands, new shops and new items that would take your style on another level.
 
💞🛍 Have fun with fashion ! 
 
A question? Need help? Or any message?  We’re here for you, just tell us at contact@itscalledfashion.com 💌
 
---------------------------
